changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.service_configuration ( id text PRIMARY KEY, description text, value_type text, value text );

changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM service_configuration WHERE id IN ('VALIDATION_SMS_SEND_MAX', 'VALIDATION_SMS_SEND_BLOCK_PERIOD', 'VALIDATION_SMS_TIMEOUT', 'VALIDATION_SMS_TEST_MODE', 'VALIDATION_SMS_TEST_CODE', 'VALIDATION_SMS_CODE_LENGTH');

changeSet.author: tsydenov_ia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.validation ( id text, type text, send_count integer, first_send_date timestamptz, PRIMARY KEY (id, type) );

changeSet.author: tsydenov_ia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.validation_code ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, validation_id text, validation_type text, value text, issue_date timestamptz, expire_date timestamptz, FOREIGN KEY (validation_id, validation_type) REFERENCES validation(id, type) );
